text: Carole Bouquet (born 18 August 1957) is a French actress and fashion model. Her career began in 1977. She starred as a Bond girl in For Your Eyes Only (1981). In 1990, she was awarded the CÃ©sar Award for Best Actress for her role in Too Beautiful for You. She was the face of Chanel No. 5 fragrance from 1986 to 1997. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:French movie actors Category:French television actors Category:French stage actors Category:French models Category:Actors from Hauts-de-Seine Category:People from Neuilly-sur-Seine
title: Carole Bouquet
